articles.description: Captain Troy Deeney has refused to attend training as he fears putting his baby son at risk, and several of his team-mates are reportedly joining his stance
articles.content:
More Watford players are reportedly refusing to return to training after the club recorded three of the Premier League's six positive tests for coronavirus.

articles.title: Newcastle's incoming owners urged to bring one person in before signing Coutinho or Bale - Express.co.uk
articles.description: Newcastle United have been urged to focus on bringing in a new manager before signing players.
articles.content:
"I've been reading the press in England and it's mentioned Coutinho, it's mentioned Gareth Bale, it's mentioned Koulibaly.
"The first man that has to come through the door for Newcastle has to be a top-class manager.
